name: Ice Cream Pop: With Vanilla, chocolate & Strawberry Flavours
name_original: Ice Cream Pop: With Vanilla, chocolate & Strawberry Flavours
description:
Ice Cream Pop is the crazy chain reaction game that has already had millions and millions of levels played since it was introduced early this year. Come join the fun!

• Simple Objective: "Pop" all ice cream with a limited # of taps
• Full Retina & iPhone 5 support!
• New PowerUps! will help you get through the hard levels!
• FREE tips EVERY DAY!

Can you go all the way? Come join the fun
